Html:
Hi radioman... Ive been developing an air pollutant dispersion model (Windows application) using c#.net over last 10 months.. And things have become much easier thanx for this great project.. Im trying to represent the concentration levels by painting areas on the map..

After going through available discussion i noted that there is a method called OnPaintETC.. Im using GMapHotBuild 1.5.5.5 version.. But So far i couldnt make it.

I will be very thankful if you could help me or direct me to a helpful link regarding painting on maps and layers .. thanx in advance... :)
